author: Andrew

review: This thing is GREAT! I bought it for my 10 year old for Xmas and I absolutely love it. There are parental control features and the apps download/open extremely quickly. When I made this purchase, an Amazon call rep told me that you can use an Xbox controller with the Fire box. This is not true (at least I haven't been able to get it to work), so you will have to purchase the Amazon Fire or Nyko controller separately if you need a controller. Gameplay, on the games that do not require a controller, is fine (my son loves "Hungry Shark"). I have never experienced lag, and honestly, this thing loads streaming content (HULU, Amazon Prime, Netflix, Pandora, etc) much faster than my Xbox360. We recently purchased a controller, so I'll update my review when it arrives and we've had some time to play around with it.The only reasons I did not give it 5 stars is that you cannot program a "sleep timer" and there is no single button to turn the thing off (you have to go into settings=> system=>sleep). Not the biggest deal in the world, but it can be annoying. And the remote burns battery power pretty quickly. Other than those, I have not come across a downside.**Update 4-20/15: Wow, Amazon has hiked the price $20 :-(. Anyway, a recent update has addressed one of my issues with turning the system off, allowing users to hold the home button to reach a shortcut to put the Fire TV box to sleep. Still, it would be nice if there was a sleep timer... Also, the controllers take FOREVER to ship. I can't wait to try it once it FINALLY arrives.***Please ignore all of the 1-star reviews from people who have not even purchased this product. This is a great streaming device with lots of games and streaming apps included for no extra charge. I am an avid gamer and would not presume this would replace my Xbox; however, it is a WONDERFUL product for a great price. Great for kids' TV, and adults.***
author: Mika
